Class Camp

java.lang.Object
CampInformation
Camp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visibility
public class Camp extends CampInformation
The Camp class represents a camp with a specific information The Camp compose of CampConstraints and references to attendee, camp committee, staff, enquiry, and suggestion. The Camp class provide functionality for making changes to the camp, which includes submitting enquiries, suggestions, editing the camp details, and retrieving camp information. It extends the CampInformation class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(int campID, String campName, ArrayList<Date> campDates, Date registrationDeadline, String schoolOpenTo, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description, String staffID, boolean isCampVisible)
      Constructs a new empty camp by staff
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp.
      campDates - The dates of the camp.
      registrationDeadline - The deadline for registration.
      schoolOpenTo - The schools in which students are allowed to attend the camp.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The total slots for the attendees of the camp.
      campCommitteeSlots - The total slots for the camp committee.
      description - The description of the camp.
      staffID - The staff ID of the committee organizing the camp.
      isCampVisible - A boolean indicating whether the student can see this camp or not.

    • Camp

      public Camp(int campID, String campName, ArrayList<Date> campDates, Date registrationDeadline, String schoolOpenTo, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description, String staffID, ArrayList<String> withdrawn, ArrayList<String> attendees, ArrayList<String> committeeMembers, boolean isCampVisible, HashMap<Integer,Enquiry> campEnquiries, HashMap<Integer,Suggestion> campSuggestions)
      Constructs a new camp with existing data from the database.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp.
      campDates - The dates of the camp.
      registrationDeadline - The deadline for registrations.
      schoolOpenTo - The allowed schools from which attendees are allowed to register for the camp.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The total slots for the attendees and committees of the camp.
      campCommitteeSlots - The reserved slots for the camp committee.
      description - The description of the camp.
      staffID - The staff ID of the committee organizing the camp.
      withdrawn - List of withdrawn registrants.
      attendees - List of attendees.
      committeeMembers - List of committee members.
      isCampVisible - true if the camp is visible to student, otherwise false.
      campEnquiries - The HashMap of enquiryID and Enquiry.
      campSuggestions - The HashMap of suggestionID and Suggestion.

    • hide

      public void hide() throws CampException
      Hides the camp so that the student cannot see this camp in their all camp list.
      Specified by:
      hide in interface Visibility
      Overrides:
      hide in class CampInformation
      Throws:
      CampException - If the camp cannot be hidden (Ex. There is student already registered for this camp)

    • setFacultyOpenTo

      public void setFacultyOpenTo(String facultyOpenTo) throws CampException
      Change the faculty that this camp opens to.
      Overrides:
      setFacultyOpenTo in class CampInformation
      Parameters:
      facultyOpenTo - The String of the new faculty to change to ("*" indicating the camp is open to all faculty)
      Throws:
      CampException - If the faculty cannot be modified (Ex. There is student from other faculty already registered for this camp)
